top_stories.title: French and Malaysian authorities are investigating Grok for generating sexualized deepfakes
top_stories.description: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.
top_stories.author: Anthony Ha
top_stories.content: France and Malaysia have joined India in condemning Grok for creating sexualized deepfakes of women and minors.

top_stories.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
top_stories.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]
top_stories.author: Kosti Vasilakakis
top_stories.content: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]

top_stories.title: Semperis Named Security Partner of the Year in Cohesity FY2025 Partner Awards
top_stories.description: Semperis, a provider of AI-powered identity security and cyber resilience, has been named by Cohesity, the leader in AI-powered data security, as its Security Partner of the Year in the FY2025 Cohesity Partner Awards. The annual awards celebrate partners who demonstrate exceptional commitment to helping organizations strengthen cyber resilience, accelerate recovery, and... top_stories.title: Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents
top_stories.description: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. Instead of forcing a model to read a giant prompt in one pass, RLMs treat the prompt as an external environment and let the model decide how to inspect it with code, then recursively call […] The post Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents appeared first on MarkTechPost.
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models.
